fried-egg.proTip: Your first recipe - cook eggs instead of selling raw. 35g sell vs 50g raw egg, but +50 energy makes it valuable early game when food is scarce.
fried-egg.strategyNote: Keep 1-2 cooked for energy in mines. As you get better food sources, sell eggs raw or process into Mayo (190g base).
fried-egg.profitTip: Raw egg sells higher. Cook only for personal use.

omelet.proTip: Wait for Queen of Sauce Year 1 Spring 28. Egg + Milk = 100 energy. Better than fried egg but milk has better uses (Cheese = 230g).
omelet.strategyNote: Decent mid-game food but Cheese is more profitable than Omelet. Cook for personal use only, never sell.
omelet.profitTip: Make Cheese instead. 125g omelet vs 230g cheese from same milk.
omelet.pairsWellWith: Skull Cavern runs when you need quick energy

salad.proTip: Get from Emily at 3 hearts. Uses foraged items (Leek + Dandelion) that are easy Spring finds. 113 energy is solid.
salad.strategyNote: One of the best early-game recipes using free foraged ingredients. Stock up on Leeks and Dandelions in Spring for year-round salads.
salad.profitTip: Never sell - the ingredients are worth more as energy than gold.

cheese-cauliflower.proTip: Pam 3 hearts recipe. Cauliflower (175g raw, 262g gold) + Cheese (230g) = 300g dish. Math doesn't favor cooking.
cheese-cauliflower.strategyNote: This is a trap recipe for profit. Only cook for gifting (Lewis loves it) or personal use. Sell ingredients separately.
cheese-cauliflower.profitTip: AVOID cooking for profit. Raw ingredients sell for more.

baked-fish.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Summer 7. Uses common fish (Sunfish + Bream). 75 energy is mediocre but ingredients are easy.
baked-fish.strategyNote: Filler recipe. The fish are worth more in Fish Ponds or sold raw. Only cook if you have excess common fish.
baked-fish.profitTip: Put Bream in Fish Pond instead - produces Roe worth more long-term.

parsnip-soup.proTip: Caroline 3 hearts. Uses Parsnip + Milk + Vinegar. Only 85 energy. Parsnips are better sold or gifted to Pam.
parsnip-soup.strategyNote: Weak recipe. Parsnips sell for 35g raw, Gold quality 52g. The milk alone is worth more as cheese.
parsnip-soup.profitTip: Skip this recipe entirely for profit.
parsnip-soup.pairsWellWith: Early Spring when you have excess parsnips

vegetable-medley.proTip: Caroline 7 hearts. Tomato + Beet = 120 energy. Both vegetables are common crops. Decent everyday food.
vegetable-medley.strategyNote: Solid recipe once you have Beets (Fall Year 1 or later from Oasis). Keep a stack for mining.
vegetable-medley.profitTip: Cook for use, not profit. Ingredients sell higher raw.

complete-breakfast.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Spring 21. THE breakfast. +2 Farming buff for 7 min. Stack with Coffee for speed.
complete-breakfast.strategyNote: One of the best buff foods. Farming buff helps with watering efficiency and crop quality. Make this your daily morning meal.
complete-breakfast.profitTip: Never sell. The farming buff is invaluable during harvest seasons.
complete-breakfast.pairsWellWith: Coffee (speed), Harvest days, Ginger Island farming

fried-calamari.proTip: Jodi 3 hearts. Squid (night ocean fishing) + Wheat Flour + Oil. 80 energy, no buffs. Squid is rare.
fried-calamari.strategyNote: Not worth the Squid. Squid sells for 80g and is used in Squid Ink Ravioli (better recipe). Skip this.
fried-calamari.profitTip: Save Squid for Fish Pond (produces Squid Ink) or Squid Ink Ravioli.

lucky-lunch.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Spring 28. +3 Luck for 11 minutes. ESSENTIAL for Skull Cavern. Sea Cucumber + Tortilla + Blue Jazz.
lucky-lunch.strategyNote: THE Skull Cavern recipe. +3 Luck dramatically increases iridium node spawns and ladder chances. Always bring 5-10 for deep runs.
lucky-lunch.profitTip: Never sell. The luck buff is worth far more than any sell price.
lucky-lunch.pairsWellWith: Spicy Eel (speed + luck stack), Coffee, Staircases

spicy-eel.proTip: George 7 hearts OR Serpent drops in Skull Cavern. +1 Luck +1 Speed. THE meta Skull Cavern food.
spicy-eel.strategyNote: Best all-around buff food. Luck + Speed in one meal. Serpents drop it frequently - save every one you get.
spicy-eel.profitTip: NEVER sell. This is your premium buff food. Hoard all Spicy Eel from Serpent drops.
spicy-eel.pairsWellWith: Coffee (speed stacks), Lucky Lunch (luck stacks for mega runs)

sashimi.proTip: Linus 3 hearts. ANY fish = 75 energy. Use trash fish like Carp, Bream. Best early energy food.
sashimi.strategyNote: Game-changing recipe. Turn worthless fish into energy. Carp (30g) becomes 75 energy. Essential for mine runs.
sashimi.profitTip: Use lowest value fish. Carp, Bream, Chub are ideal candidates.
sashimi.pairsWellWith: Budget Skull Cavern runs, any exploration

maki-roll.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Summer 21. Fish + Seaweed + Rice. 100 energy. Seaweed is free from beach/fishing.
maki-roll.strategyNote: Good recipe but Sashimi is often better (fewer ingredients). Use if you have excess Rice and Seaweed.
maki-roll.profitTip: Cook for use, Sashimi is more efficient for pure energy.

pizza.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Spring 7 OR Saloon 600g. Wheat Flour + Tomato + Cheese. 150 energy, no buff.
pizza.strategyNote: Decent everyday food. Buy from Saloon when lazy. The recipe is better value long-term if you farm ingredients.
pizza.profitTip: Don't sell. Better than buying from Saloon at 600g.

pumpkin-pie.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Winter 21. Pumpkin + Wheat Flour + Milk + Sugar. 225 energy. Fall prep required.
pumpkin-pie.strategyNote: High energy but Pumpkin sells for 320g raw. Only cook for gifts (universal like) or if you have Gold+ Pumpkins for Giant Pumpkin attempts.
pumpkin-pie.profitTip: Pumpkins are worth more raw. Cook only excess from Giant Pumpkin harvests.
pumpkin-pie.pairsWellWith: Fall harvest surplus, winter gift prep

cranberry-sauce.proTip: Gus 7 hearts. Cranberries + Sugar. 125 energy. Cranberries regrow so you'll have tons.
cranberry-sauce.strategyNote: Good use for excess Cranberries after you've processed main harvest into Wine/Jelly. Quick to make.
cranberry-sauce.profitTip: Wine and Jelly are more profitable. Cook sauce only from excess.

stuffing.proTip: Pam 7 hearts. Bread + Cranberries + Hazelnut. 170 energy. The Hazelnut is the bottleneck.
stuffing.strategyNote: Good Fall recipe since Hazelnuts drop from bushes. Bread is cheap (100g Saloon). Solid energy for exploration.
stuffing.profitTip: Better than selling ingredients separately. Good profit recipe.

farmers-lunch.proTip: Farming Level 3 reward. Omelet + Parsnip. +3 Farming buff for 5 min 35 sec. Cheap farming buff.
farmers-lunch.strategyNote: Budget version of Complete Breakfast. Use for quick farming tasks. +3 Farming improves hoe efficiency.
farmers-lunch.profitTip: Never sell. Use for personal farming boost.

survival-burger.proTip: Foraging Level 2 reward. Bread + Cave Carrot + Eggplant. +3 Foraging buff for 5 min 35 sec.
survival-burger.strategyNote: The foraging buff helps find more forage items AND improves axe efficiency. Great for hardwood runs.
survival-burger.profitTip: Never sell. Use for foraging trips and tree chopping.
survival-burger.pairsWellWith: Secret Woods hardwood farming, foraging routes

dish-o-the-sea.proTip: Fishing Level 3 reward. Sardine + Hashbrowns. +3 Fishing buff for 5 min 35 sec. ESSENTIAL for hard fish.
dish-o-the-sea.strategyNote: Must-have for catching difficult fish. +3 Fishing makes the bar significantly larger. Stock up before going for legendaries.
dish-o-the-sea.profitTip: Never sell. The fishing buff is critical for rare catches.
dish-o-the-sea.pairsWellWith: Legendary fish attempts, Lava Eel, Octopus

miners-treat.proTip: Mining Level 3 reward. Cave Carrot + Sugar + Milk. +3 Mining buff for 5 min 35 sec.
miners-treat.strategyNote: +3 Mining makes pickaxe more efficient. Useful for breaking rocks faster. Not as essential as Dish o The Sea.
miners-treat.bestUse: Mining efficiency, Skull Cavern rock breaking
miners-treat.profitTip: Cook for personal use during mine runs.
miners-treat.pairsWellWith: Skull Cavern, Volcano Dungeon, node farming

roots-platter.proTip: Combat Level 3 reward. Cave Carrot + Winter Root. +3 Attack buff for 5 min 35 sec.
roots-platter.strategyNote: +3 Attack is significant damage boost. Cave Carrot from mines, Winter Root from Winter foraging/hoeing.
roots-platter.profitTip: Save for Skull Cavern or Volcano combat.
roots-platter.pairsWellWith: Skull Cavern Serpents, Volcano Dungeon enemies

seafoam-pudding.proTip: Fishing Level 9 reward. Flounder + Midnight Carp + Squid. +4 Fishing buff for 10 min. THE fishing food.
seafoam-pudding.strategyNote: Best fishing buff in the game. +4 Fishing is massive. Save exclusively for legendary fish and the hardest catches.
seafoam-pudding.profitTip: NEVER waste on easy fish. Reserve for Legend, Glacierfish, Crimsonfish.
seafoam-pudding.pairsWellWith: All legendary fish attempts, Lava Eel

pepper-poppers.proTip: Shane 3 hearts. Hot Pepper + Cheese. +2 Speed +1 Farming for 7 min. Speed buff is the star.
pepper-poppers.strategyNote: Good speed buff food. Hot Peppers are easy to grow. Speed helps cover ground faster.
pepper-poppers.profitTip: Cook for use, especially for large farm layouts.

maple-bar.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Summer 14. Maple Syrup + Sugar + Wheat Flour. +1 Farming +1 Fishing +1 Mining for 16 min 47 sec.
maple-bar.strategyNote: Jack of all trades buff. Long duration is nice. Maple Syrup takes 9 days per tap, so plan ahead.
maple-bar.profitTip: Good for days mixing fishing and mining.
maple-bar.pairsWellWith: Mixed activity days, all-around buff needs

plum-pudding.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Winter 7. Wild Plum x2 + Wheat Flour + Sugar. 100 energy, no buff.
plum-pudding.strategyNote: Uses Fall forage (Wild Plums). Decent Winter recipe when forage is scarce. Stock up on Wild Plums in Fall.
plum-pudding.bestUse: Winter energy food from stored Fall forage
plum-pudding.profitTip: Not for profit. Use to convert stored plums to energy.

artichoke-dip.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Fall 28. Artichoke + Milk. 100 energy. Artichoke is Year 2 crop.
artichoke-dip.strategyNote: Can't make until Year 2 when Artichokes unlock at Pierre's. Not particularly special but uses excess artichokes.
artichoke-dip.profitTip: Artichokes sell for 160g. Dip for personal use only.

stir-fry.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Spring 7. Cave Carrot + Common Mushroom + Kale + Oil. 335 energy. HUGE value.
stir-fry.strategyNote: Excellent energy-to-ingredient ratio. Cave Carrots from mines, Mushrooms from Fall/Cave. Kale is cheap Spring crop.
stir-fry.profitTip: One of the best energy returns. Make lots for Skull Cavern.
stir-fry.pairsWellWith: Deep Skull Cavern runs, multi-day trips

roasted-hazelnuts.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Summer 28. Hazelnut x3. 70 energy. Simple Fall forage recipe.
roasted-hazelnuts.strategyNote: Quick use for Hazelnut stockpile. Not amazing but converts abundant Fall forage to portable energy.
roasted-hazelnuts.profitTip: Hazelnuts are worth more in other recipes. Use only if you have tons.

poppyseed-muffin.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Winter 7. Poppy + Wheat Flour + Sugar. 250 energy. Poppy is Summer flower.
poppyseed-muffin.strategyNote: High energy, but Poppy sells for 140g. Only cook if you have excess Poppies after Penny gifts (she loves them).
poppyseed-muffin.bestUse: High energy food from Summer flower
poppyseed-muffin.profitTip: Penny loves Poppy. Gift first, cook excess only.

triple-shot-espresso.proTip: Buy recipe from Saloon 5000g. Coffee x3. +1 Speed for 4 min 12 sec. Speed stacks with food!
triple-shot-espresso.strategyNote: ESSENTIAL. Speed stacks with other food buffs. Always have Coffee or Espresso active. Make Coffee from Coffee Beans in Keg.
triple-shot-espresso.profitTip: Never sell. Speed saves time = more profit long-term.
triple-shot-espresso.pairsWellWith: EVERYTHING. Always have speed buff active.

cookie.proTip: Evelyn 4 hearts. Wheat Flour + Sugar + Egg. 90 energy. Simple, uses basic ingredients.
cookie.strategyNote: Good early-mid game snack. Ingredients are all easy to acquire. Not amazing but reliable.
cookie.profitTip: Cook for personal use, ingredients are cheap.

ice-cream.proTip: Buy recipe from Saloon 2000g. Milk + Sugar. 100 energy. Simple Summer treat.
ice-cream.strategyNote: Easy to make, uses common ingredients. Good for everyday energy. Also sold at Festival stands.
ice-cream.profitTip: Make instead of buying at 250g each.

blueberry-tart.proTip: Pierre 3 hearts. Blueberry + Wheat Flour + Sugar + Egg. 125 energy. Uses Summer crop.
blueberry-tart.strategyNote: Good way to use Blueberries not going to Wine. Solid energy but Wine is more profitable for main harvest.
blueberry-tart.profitTip: Make Wine from main harvest. Tarts from extras only.

crab-cakes.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Fall 21. Crab + Wheat Flour + Egg + Oil. 225 energy +1 Speed +1 Defense.
crab-cakes.strategyNote: Great combo of energy AND buffs. Crabs from Crab Pots or Beach. The Speed buff is valuable.
crab-cakes.profitTip: Cook for use, great buff combination.

fish-taco.proTip: Linus 7 hearts. Tuna + Tortilla + Red Cabbage + Mayo. 165 energy +2 Fishing for 7 min.
fish-taco.strategyNote: Solid fishing buff food. Tuna is common Ocean fish. Use when Dish o The Sea isn't enough.
fish-taco.profitTip: Cook for fishing trips, especially multi-catch sessions.
fish-taco.pairsWellWith: Extended fishing sessions, Summer ocean fishing

chowder.proTip: Willy 3 hearts. Clam + Milk. 225 energy. Clams are common beach forage.
chowder.strategyNote: Excellent energy from free beach Clams. One of the best energy-per-rarity ratios. Stock up on Clams!
chowder.profitTip: One of the best value recipes. Clams are nearly worthless raw.

fish-stew.proTip: Willy 7 hearts. Crayfish + Mussel + Periwinkle + Tomato. 225 energy +3 Fishing for 16 min.
fish-stew.strategyNote: Long duration fishing buff. All shellfish from Crab Pots. Set up pots and accumulate ingredients over time.
fish-stew.profitTip: Crab Pot shells have little other use. Great conversion to buff food.
fish-stew.pairsWellWith: Legendary fish marathons, extended fishing trips

escargot.proTip: Willy 5 hearts. Snail + Garlic. 225 energy +2 Fishing for 16 min 47 sec.
escargot.strategyNote: Snails from Crab Pots in freshwater. Good fishing buff with long duration. Garlic is easy Spring crop.
escargot.bestUse: Fishing buff from Crab Pot byproduct
escargot.profitTip: Snails are worthless otherwise. Great conversion.
escargot.pairsWellWith: River fishing, freshwater Crab Pot setup

lobster-bisque.proTip: Willy 9 hearts OR Queen of Sauce Year 2 Winter 14. Lobster + Milk. 225 energy +3 Fishing +50 Max Energy.
lobster-bisque.strategyNote: Premium fishing buff with max energy boost. Lobsters from Crab Pots. Save for important fishing sessions.
lobster-bisque.profitTip: Lobsters sell for 120g. Cook for buff, not profit.

pale-broth.proTip: Stardrop Saloon 1000g after Community Center. Ghost Fish x2. 150 energy +2 Mining for 7 min.
pale-broth.strategyNote: Ghost Fish are mine floor 20-60 fish. Mining buff helps in Skull Cavern. Good use for otherwise meh fish.
pale-broth.bestUse: Mining buff from common mine fish
pale-broth.profitTip: Ghost Fish (45g) are better as broth than sold.
pale-broth.pairsWellWith: Skull Cavern mining, iridium node breaking

algae-soup.proTip: Fishing Level 6 reward. Green Algae x4. 100 energy. Uses fishing byproduct.
algae-soup.strategyNote: Green Algae is worthless (15g). Convert to energy instead of selling. Free energy source.
algae-soup.profitTip: Never sell Algae. Always cook into soup.

tom-kha-soup.proTip: Sandy (mail at 7 hearts). Coconut + Shrimp + Common Mushroom. 175 energy +2 Farming +2 Foraging for 7 min.
tom-kha-soup.strategyNote: Unique dual buff. Coconuts from Desert palm trees (shake them!). Shrimp from Ocean Crab Pots.
tom-kha-soup.profitTip: Great buff combo, make for personal use.
tom-kha-soup.pairsWellWith: Days mixing farming and foraging, Ginger Island

trout-soup.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Fall 14. Rainbow Trout + Green Algae. 100 energy +1 Fishing for 4 min 39 sec.
trout-soup.strategyNote: Budget fishing buff. Rainbow Trout is Summer river fish. Short duration but uses cheap ingredients.
trout-soup.profitTip: Use when you don't want to waste better buff food.

chocolate-cake.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Winter 14. Wheat Flour + Sugar + Egg. 250 energy. Universal like gift.
chocolate-cake.strategyNote: High energy AND universal liked gift. Great for friendship grinding. The villager loves list excludes only a few.
chocolate-cake.profitTip: One of best gift foods. Make extras for birthdays.

pink-cake.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Summer 21. Melon + Wheat Flour + Sugar + Egg. 250 energy. Universal like gift.
pink-cake.strategyNote: Same as Chocolate Cake but needs Melon. Make when you have Summer Melon surplus after Giant Melon attempts.
pink-cake.profitTip: Chocolate Cake is easier to make year-round.

rhubarb-pie.proTip: Marnie 7 hearts. Rhubarb + Wheat Flour + Sugar. 250 energy. Rhubarb from Desert Oasis Spring.
rhubarb-pie.strategyNote: Requires Desert access for Rhubarb seeds. Good energy but Rhubarb sells for 220g raw. Cook only excess.
rhubarb-pie.profitTip: Raw Rhubarb or Wine is more profitable. Cook excess only.

red-plate.proTip: Emily 7 hearts. Red Cabbage + Radish. 240 energy +50 Max Energy for 3 min 30 sec.
red-plate.strategyNote: Max Energy buff is unique. Both crops are Summer. The 50 extra max energy helps for tough runs.
red-plate.bestUse: Max energy boost for tough content
red-plate.pairsWellWith: Skull Cavern deep runs, max stamina situations

fruit-salad.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Fall 7. Blueberry + Melon + Apricot. 263 energy. Uses Summer fruits.
fruit-salad.strategyNote: High energy but ingredients have better uses (Wine). Make from excess fruit not going to Kegs.
fruit-salad.bestUse: High energy from Summer fruit surplus
fruit-salad.profitTip: Wine is more profitable. Cook only extras.
fruit-salad.pairsWellWith: Summer fruit overflow after Keg production

rice-pudding.proTip: Evelyn 7 hearts. Milk + Sugar + Rice. 115 energy, no buff. Uses Unmilled Rice.
rice-pudding.strategyNote: Simple recipe. Rice from River fishing or Rice Shoots. Not amazing but uses ingredients with few other uses.
rice-pudding.profitTip: Rice doesn't have many uses. Decent conversion.

radish-salad.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Spring 21. Radish + Oil + Vinegar. 300 energy. Summer crop.
radish-salad.strategyNote: Excellent energy from Summer Radish. 300 energy is one of the highest. Radishes are cheap (40 seeds).
radish-salad.bestUse: High energy food from common crop
radish-salad.profitTip: One of the best energy/cost ratios. Make lots.

pumpkin-soup.proTip: Robin 7 hearts. Pumpkin + Milk. 200 energy +2 Defense +2 Luck for 7 min 41 sec.
pumpkin-soup.strategyNote: LUCK BUFF! +2 Luck is excellent for Skull Cavern. Pumpkins are Fall crop. Stock up before Winter.
pumpkin-soup.profitTip: The luck buff makes this worth cooking despite Pumpkin value (320g).
pumpkin-soup.pairsWellWith: Skull Cavern iridium farming, ladder luck

super-meal.proTip: Kent (mail Year 2) OR Queen of Sauce Year 2 Summer 7. Bok Choy + Cranberries + Artichoke. +40 Max Energy +1 Speed for 3 min 30 sec.
super-meal.strategyNote: Requires Year 2 crops (Artichoke). Speed + Max Energy is nice combo. Make when you have all ingredients.
super-meal.profitTip: Good buff combination, cook for personal use.

hashbrowns.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Spring 14 OR buy from Saloon. Potato + Oil. 90 energy +1 Farming for 5 min 35 sec.
hashbrowns.strategyNote: Cheap farming buff. Potatoes are Spring staple. Oil from making Mayo. Great early game buff food.
hashbrowns.profitTip: Cheap to make, good daily farming boost.

pancakes.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Summer 14. Wheat Flour + Egg. 90 energy +2 Foraging for 11 min.
pancakes.strategyNote: Long foraging buff from simple ingredients. Great for foraging routes and Secret Woods trips.
pancakes.profitTip: Simple to make, good foraging boost.
pancakes.pairsWellWith: Foraging days, Secret Woods hardwood runs

salmon-dinner.proTip: Gus 3 hearts. Salmon + Amaranth + Kale. 125 energy +1 Fishing for 5 min 35 sec.
salmon-dinner.strategyNote: Uses Fall crops (Amaranth, Kale) and Fall fish (Salmon). Decent fishing buff but Dish o The Sea is often better.
salmon-dinner.profitTip: Make when you have ingredient surplus.

crispy-bass.proTip: Kent (mail Year 2). Largemouth Bass + Wheat Flour + Oil. 150 energy. Uses common fish.
crispy-bass.strategyNote: Largemouth Bass is everywhere (Mountain Lake). Good use for common fish. Better than selling bass raw (100g).
crispy-bass.profitTip: Better than selling raw bass. Good conversion.

bread.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Summer 28 OR buy from Saloon 100g. Wheat Flour. 50 energy. Simplest recipe.
bread.strategyNote: Buy from Saloon unless you have excess Wheat. 50 energy for 100g is poor. Used in other recipes mainly.
bread.profitTip: Buy from Saloon, don't waste Wheat Flour.

tortilla.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Fall 7 OR buy from Saloon 100g. Corn. 50 energy. Used in recipes.
tortilla.strategyNote: Like Bread, mainly an ingredient. Buy from Saloon or cook from excess Corn. Fish Taco and Lucky Lunch need it.
tortilla.profitTip: Keep some for Lucky Lunch production.

strange-bun.proTip: Shane 7 hearts. Wheat Flour + Periwinkle + Void Mayonnaise. 225 energy. Weird recipe.
strange-bun.strategyNote: Void Mayonnaise from Void Eggs. Interesting but not particularly useful. Make for completion.
strange-bun.profitTip: Void Mayo has better uses. Make once for completion.

glazed-yams.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 1 Fall 21. Yam + Sugar. 200 energy. Fall crop recipe.
glazed-yams.strategyNote: Solid energy from Fall Yams. Yams sell for 160g, so cooking is decent conversion to energy.

fried-mushroom.proTip: Demetrius 3 hearts. Common Mushroom + Morel + Oil. 135 energy +2 Attack for 7 min.
fried-mushroom.strategyNote: Attack buff from forage! Morel is Spring forage. Good combat food for early game.
fried-mushroom.profitTip: Morel sells for 150g. Cook if you need attack buff.
fried-mushroom.pairsWellWith: Mine combat, early Skull Cavern attempts

bruschetta.proTip: Gus 7 hearts. Bread + Oil + Tomato. 113 energy. Simple Summer recipe.
bruschetta.strategyNote: Nothing special. Make if you have ingredients and need energy. Tomatoes have better uses (Ketchup).
bruschetta.profitTip: Tomatoes are better as Ketchup (270g Artisan).

coleslaw.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Spring 14. Red Cabbage + Vinegar + Mayonnaise. 145 energy. Uses Summer crop.
coleslaw.strategyNote: Red Cabbage is Summer Year 2 crop. Not great value - Red Cabbage sells for 260g raw.
coleslaw.profitTip: Red Cabbage is worth more raw or as Wine.

fiddlehead-risotto.proTip: Queen of Sauce Year 2 Fall 28. Oil + Fiddlehead Fern + Garlic. 350 energy +30 Max Energy. MASSIVE ENERGY.
fiddlehead-risotto.strategyNote: 350 energy is HUGE. Fiddlehead Fern is Summer Secret Woods forage. Stock up in Summer for year-round use.
fiddlehead-risotto.profitTip: One of the highest energy foods. Worth making.
fiddlehead-risotto.pairsWellWith: Deep Skull Cavern runs, marathon sessions

bean-hotpot.proTip: Clint 7 hearts. Green Bean x2. 100 energy +30 Max Energy for 5 min 35 sec.
bean-hotpot.strategyNote: Max Energy buff from cheap Spring beans. Green Beans regrow so you'll have plenty.
bean-hotpot.bestUse: Max energy buff from Spring crop
bean-hotpot.profitTip: Green Beans are cheap. Good buff conversion.

eggplant-parmesan.proTip: Lewis 7 hearts. Eggplant + Tomato. 175 energy +1 Mining +3 Defense for 4 min 39 sec.
eggplant-parmesan.strategyNote: Mining and Defense from Summer/Fall crops. Decent for mine protection.
eggplant-parmesan.profitTip: Good buff combination for mine safety.

autumn-bounty.proTip: Demetrius 7 hearts. Yam + Pumpkin. 220 energy +2 Foraging +2 Defense for 7 min 41 sec.
autumn-bounty.strategyNote: Uses two valuable Fall crops but dual buffs are good. Make from excess Fall harvest.
autumn-bounty.profitTip: Crops are valuable. Cook only from surplus.

squid-ink-ravioli.proTip: Combat Level 9 reward. Squid Ink + Wheat Flour + Tomato. 175 energy +1 Mining for 4 min 39 sec.
squid-ink-ravioli.strategyNote: Squid Ink from Squid Fish Pond (at population 9+). Mining buff is nice but Ink has other uses.
squid-ink-ravioli.profitTip: Squid Ink used in other recipes. Make from excess.

ginger-ale.proTip: Dwarf Shop. Ginger x3 + Sugar. 25 energy but main use is Nausea immunity!
ginger-ale.strategyNote: PREVENTS NAUSEA. Essential for Skull Cavern when fighting Haunted Skulls. Ginger from Ginger Island.
ginger-ale.profitTip: The nausea immunity is invaluable. Keep stock.

banana-pudding.proTip: Ginger Island Resort 30 Golden Walnuts. Banana + Milk + Sugar. 145 energy +1 Luck +1 Defense for 7 min 41 sec.
banana-pudding.strategyNote: Luck buff from Ginger Island! Bananas from Island trees or Banana Tree. Good alternative to Lucky Lunch.
banana-pudding.profitTip: Bananas are valuable (150g) but luck buff is worth it.

mango-sticky-rice.proTip: Leo 7 hearts. Mango + Coconut + Rice. 228 energy +30 Max Energy. Island ingredients.
mango-sticky-rice.strategyNote: All ingredients from Ginger Island. High energy with max energy boost. Good Island food.
mango-sticky-rice.profitTip: Use Island crops that you have surplus of.

poi.proTip: Leo 3 hearts. Taro Root x4. 75 energy. Simple Island recipe.
poi.strategyNote: Uses Taro Root from Ginger Island farming. Not amazing but converts excess Taro to energy.
poi.profitTip: Taro sells for 100g. Cook only excess.

tropical-curry.proTip: Ginger Island Resort. Coconut + Pineapple + Hot Pepper. 475 energy +4 Foraging for 5 min 16 sec.
tropical-curry.strategyNote: 475 ENERGY! One of the highest in the game. +4 Foraging is massive. Premium Ginger Island recipe.
tropical-curry.profitTip: Pineapple is valuable but this is worth it.

moss-soup.proTip: 1.6 new recipe from Krobus Shop. Moss x20. 100 energy. Uses tree moss.
moss-soup.strategyNote: 1.6 addition. Moss from trees is plentiful once you have many trees. Good conversion.
moss-soup.profitTip: Moss has few uses. Good conversion recipe.
